pr_title: Support otlp_span and otlp_metric exporter config names

timeline.message:
Support otlp_span and otelp_metric exporter config names

Signed-off-by: Pavol Loffay <ploffay@redhat.com>

timeline.bodyText: Hmm - feels a bit magic but I guess it's fine 😃
timeline.author: anuraaga
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -91,6 +91,7 @@ private static MetricExporterFactory findMetricExporterFactory(String exporterNa
       if (metricExporterFactory
           .getClass()
           .getSimpleName()
+          .replace("_", "")

replies.bodyText: yeah, maybe the factories could have a method that returns a name and do the comparison based on that.
replies.author: pavolloffay

replies.bodyText: I like the idea of SpanExporterFactory/MetricExporterFactory having a method Set<String> getNames() (Set since e.g. OtlpSpanExporterFactory can be enabled via both otlp and otlp_span)
replies.author: trask

replies.bodyText: I guess this is only applicable to our built-in exporters though, as opposed to someone building their own Exporter and using EXPORTER_JAR, so maybe not. Also, I forget, now that we are Java 8, we can always add interface methods after GA 😁
replies.author: trask

replies.bodyText: Yeah I think my idea before was to have a map of wellknown names, and only use the classname for custom exporters
replies.author: anuraaga
